reviews.review:
Awesome game. Very good entertainment and graphics for its age. I love those old type of graphics and I absolutely loved the campaign. Also, its a very cheap game, especially if you buy it in steam sales, like I did, in Valve Bundle. A lot of hours of content.
Definitely recommended.
Loved it..
Good story and i like that ending is explaining what happened in chernobyl! 10/10 game

A pesar de que es un juego que mantiene en su esencia la epoca en la que se hizo, sigue brindando esa jugabilidad y entretenimiento que siempre ha ofrecido desde que salio el primer half life, recomiendo mucho este juego para los que quieran embarcarse en una buena jugabilidad con puzles y disparos (lo que si, empiecen desde el principio)

My take on this is that it's very overrated (repetitive non-addictive gameplay, nothing new since the first one and its expansions; also the story isn't really captivating; graphics still look good IMHO; physics were revolutionary for 2004, yes, I remember that, but don't feel realistic in 2018 — everything feels like it's either made from paper, very thick carton or some undiscovered indestructible material), but overally good nevertheless. If you wanna kill your friends though, you'll have to buy HL: Deathmatch.
The best shooty mans game in history.

Abgesehen von der sehr guten und fesselnden Geschichte, die diese Spielreihe erzählt, bin ich jedes mal wieder darüber überrascht, wie gut die Grafik dieses Klassikers ist und mit wie wenig Rechenleistung man dieses Spiel auf der höchsten Stufe spielen kann.
Ich muss ehrlich sagen, es gibt einge Spiele in unserer Zeit welche von der Grafik her Half Life sehr ähnlich sind und doch das Vielfache der Rechenleistung benötigen um flüssig zu laufen.

Fesselnde Story zum Mitfiebern, super Gameplay und doch schön anzusehende Grafik.
Ich empfehle die komplette Serie und hoffe auf eine Fortsetzung seitens Valve.

Salut !

:)

Half Life va rămâne mereu un joc și o serie de suflet, cu Half Life mi-am început viața pe Steam cu Half Life o termin.

POVESTE:

Nu cred că mai are rost să zic ceva aici.

GAMEPLAY:

Tot ce mai pot adăuga îi că simți armele mult mai bine.

OPTIMIZARE:

Evident, n-am avut niciun bai.

GRAFICĂ:

Superbă.

DETALII:

Singurele minusuri pe care le are jocul sunt bug-urile, unele mega enervante.

CONȚINUT:

Pentru cei 5 euro cât am dat îs foarte mulțumit:

a) Dacă ești genul de persoană care vrea să se joace strict jocul, în jur de 4-5 ore, în funcție de cât de bine te joci.
b) Dacă îți place să lălăi, să faci trofee, îți va lua cam 7 ore, în funcție de cât ești de bun la joc.

CONCLUZIE:

Nu te poți numi jucător dacă n-ai jucat Half Life.

Ну, что сказать. Перепройдя этот шедевр игростроя, я не получил тех эмоций, которые получал в детстве. Но начнем из далека. Я купил ее на Зимней распродаже и был готов окунуться в старину, увидеть все сюжетные события вновь и... я понял что уже нет того шика. На время выхода, эта игра поражала своей проработкой, но не сейчас. Игра устарела, как морально, так и физически. Если раньше все выгре преподносило "Вау Эффект", то сейчас становится немного грусно после прохождения. Тоже можно сказать и по-поводу двух аддонов. Сюжет уже не дотягивает до современности, а геймплейно игра так и осталась на уровне. Или может я стал старее. В любом случае я ее рекомендую. Но сам больше к ней не вернусь.

If you haven't played this game you must be living under a rock. Amazing even for today's standard, a good FPS with a few puzzles here and it will leave you wanting more. If you need any more convincing to buy this game just remember it is an all time classic and is sure to stay that way!

Old but gold

Just played this game for the first time (as I just got a gaming capable PC) and this game is still amazing, almost 14 years later! Great story, Fun, fast paced gameplay, and just and overall undying game! Like seriously, how was this game made in 2004 and feel like it was made in 2011 or 2012?!
